name: Deepest Darkest Double Bogey
description:
Golf in a dungeon. 

Starting with a 3 stroke limit see if you can make it all the way to the deepest darkest part of the dungeon. Hit combat dummies to gain extra strokes and avoid explosive barrels that will send your ball flying.

Controls:

 Hold right mouse to aim. Small adjustments to your shot can be made by clicking the onscreen arrows.
The ‘+’ and ‘-‘ buttons increase and decrease the power of your shot.
